title: KIOCL Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for Consultant Posts
description: The Kudremukh Iron Ore Company Limited (KIOCL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Consultant Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech can apply for the KIOCL Notification 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, sal...
